attributes.action: 18+ years only should be charged with an adult ticket for travel
attributes.additional_details: Why should a minor pay an adult fee for travel when they have no adult privileges? Many teenagers use public transport to get to school and socialise on the weekends, however, paying an adult fee is very difficult to fund and creates a hostile relationship between the teenager and the transport company. Please help to put an end to this injustice by adding your signature. Thank you
